Texts.Eng: Craft ^orange;10 Paper^reset; at a ^orange;Furnace^reset; and return to ^green;Welchie^reset;.
I've got a tip for you: You can make ^orange;Paper^reset; in a ^orange;Furnace^reset;! I could use say, ^orange;10^reset; pieces. I'm fixin' to write some letters to loved ones.
It may not seem like much...but paper will come in handy when yer least expectin' it. Besides, it's great for writin', no matter how pretty a computer can make things look.
